Sawaddee ka welcome to hot Thai kitchen

seen in any Thai restaurants outside of Thailand

it's one of my favorite rice dishes called Kao Kluk
Gapi Kao is rice Kluk is to mix and Gapi

is shrimp paste and that is why restaurants 
here don't offer it because the shrimp paste

is the funky stuff that might get some getting 
used to so if you are feeling up to a culinary

adventure let's get started so those are all

now let me talk quickly about our shrimp paste 
Rim paste is a pace that's made from krills not

to be tossed in in the end when you're ready to

eat so it's kind of like a hybrid between a

let's get started and make our fixings the first 
and most important side dish to this is what I

call more or not what I call what is called 
Mulan or sweet pork literally but it's more

okay I'm happy with that you can push it a little

put a little bit more and then put the heat up

the shallots are gonna completely dissolve and

it's very shiny and luscious and the pork is very

you can taste it and see if you want it to sort

candy a little further if the longer you cook it

here so the next thing is uh we're gonna make very

it's gonna smell like shrimp paste anyway if you

can sort of like okay you know slowly familiarize

okay it's starting to bubble now shrimp paste best
